page.title: 09SOUTHPORT AMUSEMENTS
page.content: In Southport there are quite a lot of amusements. The main two are the fair and the outdoor swimming pool. At the fair, there are quite a lot of things. There are three Big Dipper type rides called the Looping Star, The Cyclone and the Wild Cat. Other amusements include the River Caves, the Waltzers, the Himalayas, the Caterpillar. There are quite a few side stalls,of which Shooting Galleries are the most popular. Another amusement in the fair, which is different from the rest is a Ski Lift type ride which travels above the fair. This is called the Sky Ride. One of the most popular parts of the fair is the fun house, which has a variety of different amusements inside it. Most of the rides cost forty or fifty pence but the Looping Star costs one pound.
